channel.title: Fortress Draconis: The Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The fantasy novel Fortress Draconis podcast chapter by chapter.
channel.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
channel.itunes:summary: The epic fantasy novel by New York Times Bestselling author Michael A. Stackpole brought to you in chapter-long installments, read by the author.
channel.description: The epic fantasy novel by New York Times Bestselling author Michael A. Stackpole brought to you in chapter-long installments, read by the author.
channel.itunes:keywords: audiobook, fiction, fantasy, Michael A. Stackpole, magic, novel

item.title: 7th Son Obsidian Promotional Poster
item.itunes:author: J. C. Hutchins
item.itunes:subtitle: Obsidian is Coming!
item.itunes:summary: The 7th Son adventure continues in an anthology, and Michael A. Stackpole is one of the contributing authors.
item.itunes:keywords: audiobook, fiction, 7th Son, Obsidian, dark future, Michael A. Stackpole, novel

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Twenty-five
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Kerrigan goes to war.
item.itunes:summary: The pirates attack Vilwan, and Kerrigan gets a surprise.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Twenty-four
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Alexia is received at court.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Twenty-three
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Orla gets her orders, and Will laughs a bit too hard.
item.itunes:summary: The impending pirate raid has tension running high.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Twenty-two
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Kerrigan greets the fleet.

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Eighteen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Alyx meets a sullanciri, and it's not a good time.
item.itunes:summary: Aurolani forces are crushed, but the war's not over.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Seventeen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Dranae. He's a new friend who will be very important.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Sixteen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: In the field with Alexia, and she has a plan.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Fifteen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Fourteen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Stellin is saved, or is it?.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Thirteen
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Stellin, where the fey come to play.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Twelve
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Things are not looking good for Stellin.

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: There's only one good side of an ambush to be on.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Chapter Nine
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: Will, no pressure, but you've got to save the world.

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole

item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: There are curious things up in these mountains.

item.title: Fortress Draconis: Introduction
item.itunes:author: Michael A. Stackpole
item.itunes:subtitle: A short introduction to what follows on this podcast.
item.itunes:summary: This introductory podcast provides some background on the novel, Fortress Draconis, the series it's part of, and what you should expect going forward.
item.itunes:keywords: audiobook, fiction, fantasy, Michael A. Stackpole, magic, novel
